sections.description:
This Plugin is very lightweight , useful , beatiful to your blog , it show the last qoute added in dorrar elkalam Site .
This Plugin Coded by : Waseem Senjer , for any suggestions , you can email me at waseem.senjer@gmail.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload dorar-elkalam folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your “Widget” menu add the widget to your sidebar
  4. enjoy ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
From Where the Qoutes come ?

from this site http://dorar.shamekh.ws

What is the widget option mean ?

the first one is the name of the widget , the second is to show/hide dorar elkalam link.
